article_text:
Houston, MO (65483)

Today

Thunderstorms likely. A few storms may be severe. High near 75F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch..

Tonight

Thunderstorms. A few storms may be severe. Low 63F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

article_metadata.author: JASON SMITH, Missouri’s Eighth Congressional District
